Talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you for waiting. <sp:5:0:0>This little one sure
looks happy to go for a ride with you.
Talk_57:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>That should about wrap things up. Please
take care and have a safe trip.
Talk_12: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Admiration_00>Which horse do you want to take out?
Talk_35:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Understand_00>Hm... So, you'd like to board<sp:5:0:0>
<clr:0000><sp:2:3:0><clr:ffff>, here?
Talk_58:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>On that note...<sp:5:1:0>how much do you know
about <clr:0000>whistling<clr:ffff>?

Horses will always come to their owners
when they whistle. <sp:5:0:0>If you ever lose sight
of your horse, give <clr:0000>whistling<clr:ffff> a try!
Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>There. <sp:5:0:0>We're happy to get to board such
a beautiful horse.
Talk_59:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That said, if you and your horse are too
far apart, it won't be able to hear you. Be
sure to keep that in mind!
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Oh, were you hoping to take out a
different horse?
Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>Hoho, there's a face I haven't seen
before.<sp:5:0:0> Always a pleasure to meet a
new horse.
Shall I get to registering it?
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Wild horses are wary creatures...


The trick is to approach them <clr:0000>from
behind<sp:5:0:0> <clr:ffff>while you're <clr:0000>crouching<clr:ffff> so they
don't notice you.
Talk_38:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sigh_00>You don't want to register? <sp:5:0:0>That's a
real shame.
Talk_39:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>Oh... I'm sorry, Link. You've already
registered <sp:2:e:24:1e004f0077006e00610062006c00650048006f007200730065004e0075006d00ffff00cd> horses.

Unfortunately, we can currently only take
care of <sp:2:e:24:1e004f0077006e00610062006c00650048006f007200730065004e0075006d00ffff00cd> of your horses at a time.

If you save up your Pony Points, you can
increase the number of horses you're able
to register.<sp:5:0:0>
But if you want to register the horse you
have with you now, you'll have to release
one of your others. Is that OK?
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>We wouldn't have been able to build
such a handsome <clr:0000>mini stable <clr:ffff>without
you and Karson.
I know it's been a long time coming, <sp:5:0:0>but
I'll work hard to make sure it was worth
the wait.
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>Oh! That's certainly a bold outfit
you're wearing...
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease_00>Everyone's in a commotion here at
Lookout Landing too. Lots of talk about
the Demon King reviving and the like...
The horses must've picked up on the fuss,<sp:5:0:0>
'cause they're all in a tizzy...
Register16_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I see...<sp:5:0:0> Well, if nothing else, I'm glad I got
to see such a beautiful horse.
Talk_113:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Thank you for waiting.<sp:5:0:0> Give that horse
lots of love for me, will you?
Talk_114:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>Oh!<sp:5:0:0> Planning to make Spot your own
after all, Link?
Talk_115:
Seeing as you're already a stable member,<sp:5:0:0>
I'd like to give you <clr:0000>one point<clr:ffff> to thank you
for your first visit.
Talk_80:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS_00>Ever been to the stable at the base of the
<clr:0000>Dueling Peaks<clr:ffff>? <sp:5:0:0>It's in Necluda, a region
that makes up most of the southeast.
Not a bad place to stop if you're on your
way to <clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff> or <clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>!
Talk_81:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Trouble_01>The sky's gone all gray... <sp:5:0:0>Let's hope it
doesn't rain.
Talk_117:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Consider it done.<sp:0:4:0>We'd also like to offer you, a dedicated
patron of the stables, a <clr:0000>half-price
discount<clr:ffff> to register your horse.
That makes the already low administration
fee for horse registration even lower!
Just <clr:0000>10 rupees<clr:ffff>, please.
Talk_82:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I couldn't forget that gray dappling if I
tried. <sp:5:0:0>I'm sure glad Spot's got such a
nice young man taking care of him.
Talk_118:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_01>That's wonderful to hear. <sp:5:0:0>If anything,
knowing that you'll be riding together
puts me at ease.
Let's get you registered as the new owner
then, shall we?

It feels a little funny to ask, but could I
have <clr:0000>10 rupees<clr:ffff> for the registration fee?
Talk_83:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you.<sp:5:0:0> I'm glad to spend some time
with Spot again.
Talk_119:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Sorry about this, <sp:5:0:0>but it looks like you're
a little short of the <clr:0000>10 rupee <clr:ffff>fee.

Be sure to come on back when you've got
<clr:0000>10 rupees<clr:ffff> you can spend.
Talk_60:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Huh... <sp:5:0:0>I'd love to register a wild horse for
you, but I don't see any horse to register!

Horses are wary creatures, so try to
slowly sneak up on them from behind.

Crouching down as you approach them
will make 'em easier to catch too.
Talk_84:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Notice>Well done, Link. <sp:5:1:0>It looks like you're really
saving up your points!

If you want to <clr:0000>claim a reward<clr:ffff>, be sure to
visit a proper <clr:0000>stable<clr:ffff>.
Talk_61:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Once you've got a horse following your
directions without throwing you off, bring
it right back to a <clr:0000>stable<clr:ffff> or <clr:0000>mini stable<clr:ffff>.
If you don't properly <clr:0000>register<clr:ffff> it, you can't
call it <clr:0000>your own<clr:ffff>.
Talk_62:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_01>That's wonderful to hear. <sp:5:0:0>If anything,
knowing that you'll be riding together
puts me at ease.
Let's get you registered as the new owner
then, shall we?

It feels a little funny to ask, but could I
have <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff> for the registration fee?
Talk_63:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM>Oh! Dear me... <sp:5:1:0>Maybe my old eyes aren't
what they used to be,<sp:5:0:0> but that creature
looks more monster than horse.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>It sure is a unique little thing, but I'm
afraid there are rules about what we're
allowed to board here.
Talk_40:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Understand_00>If you release a horse, it's not going to
come back. Are you sure?
Talk_86:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS_00>Ah... Any chance you're familiar with
<clr:0000>Outskirt Stable<clr:ffff>? <sp:5:0:0>It's on the road to the
Gerudo region in the southwest.
That area is known for its harsh climate,<sp:5:0:0>
so taking a rest at the stable might help
you beat the heat!
Talk_41:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Understood. <sp:5:0:0>I'm sure it's gonna miss you.


<sp:3:0:2:0100>But we of the Stable Association are
happy to take in and look after this new
friend of yours. Rest assured.
Talk_87:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Stop in anytime. <sp:5:0:0>The horses and I will be
waiting for you.
Talk_65:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM>Oh! <sp:5:1:0>Link, I hate to be the one to break
this to you, <sp:5:0:0>but that's not a horse.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>It's impressive that you're able to ride it
around like that, but I'm afraid the rules
say we're not able to board non-horses.
Talk_42:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>With that, the preparations are complete.
Let's register your new horse, shall we?
Talk_66:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Good weather never fails to put a tired
soul at ease.
Talk_89:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>Spot? Is that you?!


Does this mean you intend to take my
old friend into your care, Link?
Talk_43:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Right away. <sp:5:0:0>A few more horses might help
liven things up around here.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Oh, it's you. Your arrival is sure to cause
a bit of a stir, hm?
Talk_67:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>Look at this terrible rain... <sp:5:0:0>If you hear any
thunder, watch out for <clr:0000>lightning<clr:ffff>.
Talk_44: <sp:3:0:2:0101>So you'd like to register this horse?
near_02: This is a fine, little stable.
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Admiration_00>Well, Link, that is...<sp:5:1:0>quite the outfit!
Careful not to catch a cold.
Talk_68:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Sigh_01>It's gotten dark around here. <sp:5:0:0>Please take
care, as more <clr:0000>monsters<clr:ffff> come out at night.
Talk_45:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Consider it done.


Now, registering a horse comes with a
small administration fee. That will be
<clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>, please.
near_03: I really do miss Rito Stable.
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Sure enough, you stirred things up
around here.
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm sorry. <sp:5:1:0>If you want to <clr:0000>register a horse<clr:ffff>,
you'll have to wait a while longer.

We're still getting set up around here.
Talk_69:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Admiration_00>Fancy seeing you awake. <sp:5:0:0>This late at
night, even the monsters are sleeping.
Register00_4:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Notice>Wait a minute...<sp:5:1:0> I know this <clr:0000>golden horse<clr:ffff>!
It's the one Princess Zelda was taking
care of.<clr:0000><clr:ffff>
<sp:3:0:2:0700>While I sure appreciate you bringing this
beauty to my little stable...<sp:0:4:0>I think it'd be happier if you returned it to
the <clr:0000>person who was looking after it <clr:ffff>at
<clr:0000>Snowfield Stable<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>They must be worried about where this
darling wandered off to.
Import01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Notice>Oh?<sp:5:1:0> According to our registry, you've
used our horse-boarding service before.

I'll make sure any horse you've entrusted
to us gets registered here too. <sp:5:0:0>Check in
again to pay them a visit.
Talk_46: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>There we are. Thank you very much!
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>I think you've caused quite a stir since
your arrival here...<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0800>Ha! People do fuss, don't they?


<sp:3:0:2:0701>If this is your first visit, talk to that
<clr:0000>soldier<clr:ffff> in the center of our little fort.
Or were you hoping to <clr:0000>register a horse<clr:ffff>?
We're still getting things together on that
front, so I'm afraid you'll have to hold
your horses a while longer. Heh.
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you <clr:0000>register<clr:ffff> a wild horse as your own,
you can call that horse to you at a stable
whenever you please.
At bigger roadside stables, not only can
you register horses but you can also stay
the night.
We didn't have room to build something<clr:0000><clr:ffff>
that fancy here, <sp:5:0:0>but I did want a place
I could take care of horses properly.
Which is why Karson from Hudson
Construction is planning to build us
a <clr:0000>mini stable<clr:ffff>!
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Once it's finished, you'll be able to
register, board, and take out horses just
like you would at any other stable.
Talk_47:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Sorry about this, <sp:5:0:0>but it looks like you're
a little short of the <clr:0000>20 rupee <clr:ffff>fee.

Be sure to come on back when you've got
<clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff> you can spend.
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand_00>Stables are fully staffed and offer a full
slate of amenities, from <clr:0000>comprehensive
horse care<clr:ffff> to <clr:0000>lodging<clr:ffff> for travelers.
Mini stables like this one tend to be a
little simpler, since they're usually run
by a single manager.
Talk_48:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>So you don't want to register after all?<sp:5:0:0>
That's a shame. Would've been nice to
have a new horse around...
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I used to work at Rito Stable in <clr:0000>Hebra<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>
Had a good job taking care of horses.

<sp:3:0:2:0300>But the cold there kept getting colder,
and business got slower. In time, we had
to close.
Last I heard, the place had been bought
out by the <clr:0000>Lucky Clover Gazette<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>Just when I was feeling adrift, <sp:5:0:0>Purah
reached out to me about managing the
horses here at Lookout Landing...
And before I knew it, here I was.
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Welcome to our <clr:0000>mini stable<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:1:0>
We're here for your horse, as a
matter of course!
Talk_49:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>All righty, let's get this lovely little
horse registered.

Your horse is your partner through thick
and thin. Your pal-omino, as it were.<sp:5:0:0>
What will you call your new friend here?
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand_00>Be sure to bundle up if you're going to
<clr:0000>Hebra<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:1:0>The cold over there is intense.
KyoukaiTalk04_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I never thought that golden horse would
take such a liking to anyone other than
Princess Zelda... 
Ah, sorry, got lost in thought there.
I take it you mean to register it?
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS_00>Have you already been to
<clr:0000>New Serenne Stable<clr:ffff>?

Just follow the road from Lookout
Landing's <clr:0000>west gate<clr:ffff>. You can't miss it.
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Between constructing the mini stable and
finding Spot, there's a lot I have to thank
you for.
I don't have any great reward to give you,<sp:5:1:0>
but I promise to take care of your horses
as best I can.
KyoukaiTalk04_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oho,<sp:5:0:0> what a splendid horse. Do you want
to register it?
Talk_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>We only register, board, and bring out
horses here.
Talk_100:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I'll be adding <clr:0000>two points<clr:ffff> to your
Pony Points card.
Talk_101:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Chat_01>You'll earn points for using a stable for
the first time, registering a horse, lodging
at stables, and more.
You can earn wonderful <clr:0000>rewards<clr:ffff> based
on how many points you've saved too.
I'd love to tell you all about them, but...
Well, we mini stables don't have any
rewards to offer. So be sure to collect
what you've earned at a proper <clr:0000>stable<clr:ffff>!
Talk_102:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you. <sp:5:0:0>Take good care of Spot
for me, would you?
Talk_90:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>So, what name are you thinking of using
to register this little one?

Spot's the name I chose way back when...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>But this is your horse now, Link. You're
welcome to pick whatever name feels
right to you.
Talk_91:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>For registering a new horse, I've
added <clr:0000>one point<clr:ffff> to your collection
of Pony Points.
Talk_104:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sigh_00>So you don't want to register after all?<sp:5:0:0>
That's a shame—looks like a great horse.
Talk_92:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Now then, let's get to business.<sp:5:0:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice>Uh-oh...<sp:5:0:0> It seems that you're not yet a
stable <clr:0000>member<clr:ffff>.

But don't worry—I can get you registered
with the Stable Association now, if you'd
like. Your name, please?
Talk_105:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>"Link," is it? Let me make note of that...<sp:5:1:0>
And done. <sp:5:0:0>Your registration is complete.
Talk_106:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_01>That's wonderful to hear. <sp:5:0:0>If anything,
knowing you'll be riding together makes
me feel at ease.
Let's get you registered as the new owner
then, shall we?

Now, I usually take <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff> for the
horse-registration fee...

But given that it's your first registration,
this one's <clr:0000>free of charge<clr:ffff>.
Talk_70:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Understand_00>Oh, in that case...<sp:5:0:0> I've canceled the
registration of the new horse. It's good
to cherish the horses you have.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you save up your Pony Points, you'll be
able to increase the number of horses we
can take care of for you.
So the Stable Association looks forward to
your continued patronage!
Talk_94:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you. <sp:5:0:0>We look forward to
your next...

<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_01>Ah,<sp:5:0:0> my apologies!<sp:5:0:0> I still have to give you
your <clr:0000>Pony Points card<clr:ffff>!
Talk_107:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm afraid you can't exchange points for
<clr:0000>rewards<clr:ffff> here either. You'll have to head
to a <clr:0000>stable <clr:ffff>for that.
Talk_71:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>Oh... I'm sorry, Link. <sp:5:0:0>You've already
registered <sp:2:e:24:1e004f0077006e00610062006c00650048006f007200730065004e0075006d00ffff00cd> horses.

I'm afraid that's your limit too. All the
Pony Points in the world couldn't increase
the number of horses we can take care of.
If you want to register the horse you
have with you now, you'll have to release
one of your others. Is that OK?
Register02: <sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Sad>Which horse do you want to release?
Talk_95:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I'm going to add <clr:0000>one point<clr:ffff> to your
Pony Points card.
Talk_108:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Glad to hear it!


Now, I usually take <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff> for the
horse-registration fee...

But given that it's your first registration,
this one's <clr:0000>free of charge<clr:ffff>.
Talk_96:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>When a member uses a service at a stable
of any size, they earn <clr:0000>points<clr:ffff>.
Talk_50:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Now, Link, please give your horse a na—


<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Wait. <sp:5:0:0>Now hold on just a minute here...


Th-<sp:5:0:0>this horse... Could it be?!<sp:5:1:0> That's the
legendary <clr:0000>Epona <clr:ffff>we're looking at!

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>This here is a very special horse. <sp:5:0:0>It just
wouldn't be right to try to give her a
different name.
<sp:3:0:2:0000>With that said, shall we register her under
the name "<clr:0000>Epona<clr:ffff>"?
Talk_73:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS_00>Have you been to <clr:0000>Woodland Stable<clr:ffff>?<sp:5:0:0>
I hear there's a Great Fairy Fountain
right nearby...
If you leave out of Lookout Landing's <clr:0000>east
gate<clr:ffff>, you'll find it on the way to <clr:0000>Eldin<clr:ffff>.
Talk_97:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, you're familiar? <sp:5:0:0>Saves me an
explanation, then!
Talk_74:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Understand_00>I'm running this mini stable alone, so I
can't offer quite as many services as a
full-fledged <clr:0000>stable<clr:ffff> could.
Talk_51: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Admiration_01>Please give this little one a fitting name.
Talk_98:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Well then, as a reward for using the
mini stable for the first time...
Talk_52:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Are you all right with the name
<clr:0000><sp:2:4:0><clr:ffff>?
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oho! But you probably needed something,
didn't you?

Well, if this is your first visit, go talk to
that <clr:0000>soldier<clr:ffff> in the center of our little fort.
Talk_99:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Combining your points for using the
mini stable for the first time and
for <clr:0000>registering a horse<clr:ffff>...
Talk_76:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>From here, I'd say <clr:0000>New Serenne Stable<clr:ffff> to
the <clr:0000>west<clr:ffff> of Lookout Landing<sp:5:0:0> is probably
the closest.
Talk_53:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>Name registration complete. <sp:5:1:0>Do you plan
on taking the horse with you?
Talk_77:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hoh ho, I'll happily tell you as many
times as you like. <sp:5:1:0>I was just hoping
for somebody to talk to, anyway.
Talk_54:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Understood. <sp:5:0:0>We'll take good care of this
little one.
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>All right, let's take <clr:0000><sp:2:3:0><clr:ffff> into
our care. Wait right here.
Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I understand your feelings, Link,
I really do.

But I would get an earful from the
Stable Association if I even tried to
change a legendary horse's name.
Could you register her with the
name "<clr:0000>Epona<clr:ffff>"?
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>Now then, welcome to our <clr:0000>mini stable<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>
What can I do for you today?
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>All right, I'll call back <clr:0000><sp:2:3:0><clr:ffff>
for you. Sit tight.
Talk_56:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>Thank you for waiting. <sp:5:0:0>The horse is all
yours, Link.
Talk_79:
